item.title: Anthropic Revokes OpenAI's Access to Claude
item.description: OpenAI lost access to the Claude API this week after Anthropic claimed the company was violating its terms of service.

item.title: Seriously, Why Do Some AI Chatbot Subscriptions Cost More Than $200?
item.description: The price of expensive chatbot subscriptions is driven by vibes—not immediate profitability for AI companies.

item.title: Leaked Memo: Anthropic CEO Says the Company Will Pursue Gulf State Investments After All
item.description: “Unfortunately, I think ‘No bad person should ever benefit from our success’ is a pretty difficult principle to run a business on,” wrote Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei in a note to staff obtained by WIRE

item.title: Trump and the Energy Industry Are Eager to Power AI With Fossil Fuels
item.description: At a Pittsburgh summit, the Trump administration, energy executives, and tech barons joined as one to promote AI as the future of fossil fuels.
